items.content_html: A lightweight news aggregator built with JavaScript, offering customizable RSS feeds and real-time updates. Features include bookmarking, user accounts, and a responsive design.

items.content_html: ReqWeb is a lightweight and customizable Web Application Firewall (WAF) for Node based applications It provides IP-based filtering, request rate limiting, and logging, helping to protect your web applications from malicious traffic and unauthorized access.
items.title: TaqsBlaze/ReqWeb: ReqWeb is a lightweight and customizable Web Application Firewall (WAF) for Node based applications It provides IP-based filtering, request rate limiting, and logging, helping to protect your web applications from malicious traffic and unauthorized access.

items.content_html: A lightweight REST API designed for Minecraft plugins, hosted on Cloudflare Workers, that consolidates Mojang API requests into a single GET request for efficient retrieval of player data, UUIDs, and skins.

items.content_html: ChatNest is a lightweight, customizable, and easy-to-integrate JavaScript widget for adding chat functionality to your web applications. It comes with a flexible configuration system, allowing you to tailor the chatbot's appearance and behavior to suit your app's needs.
items.title: Pro-Sifat-Hasan/chatnest: ChatNest is a lightweight, customizable, and easy-to-integrate JavaScript widget for adding chat functionality to your web applications. It comes with a flexible configuration system, allowing you to tailor the chatbot's appearance and behavior to suit your app's needs.
